headline: Looking For Yields: Philip Morris, CME Group, And CareTrust REIT Are Consistent Moneymakers
summary: Companies with a long history of paying dividends and consistently hiking them remain appealing to income-focused investors. Philip Morris, CME Group, and CareTrust REIT have rewarded shareholders for years and recently announced dividend increases. ...
